column5: Leaving Friday morning for a 4 day paddle / camping / fishing trip down the Gibson river to Georgian Bay.  Get back from there on Monday.  Tuesday leave for Northbay area for another 4 days of fishing camping.  Man i need this vacation.  What are you guys doing for your vacations this summer?
I am on vacation now..  on Friday I drive to Wawa and fly in to a week of fishing walleye and pike
I went up to lake superior provincial park. I caught a few fish, but mostly loved the scenery and the lack of crowds.
1 more day off after 9 long months.. and I'll be getting back to work it appears!
Found out I have 8.5 weeks holidays.Just have to find time to take them. Have fun Nick and Terry.
I still have 41 more days to go until my vacation. But them I'm off to Alaska for 5 1/2 weeks. Then it will be nothing but this!!!
I don't know what I'd do with 8.5 weeks vacation.  I know there would be atleast one dead deer, bear, and a few dozen ducks
Just came back from 4 days on a beach on the  Ottawa river. Next is a one week trip is LSPP. Woo hoo
